alert.note: Alert for Merrimack; Sullivan (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 1:12PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Sullivan, southwestern Grafton and northwestern Merrimack Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 111 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ascutney, or near Claremont, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Claremont, Lebanon, Franklin, New London, Grafton, Hanover, Charlestown, Enfield, Canaan, Danbury, Groton, Newport, Bristol, Grantham, Andover, Lyme, Cornish, Hill, Croydon and Hebron. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 30 and 56. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northern and central New Hampshire.
